toolbox.desc: Toolbox with implemented interface in extrafunctions/toolboxes

name.desc: Name corresponding to the name of the interface without the "Class" suffix

toolbox.name: aroma

FSLT1.desc: Location of FSL T1 template relative to FSL path

fslsetup.desc: Path to fsl setup script, executing before any fsl command

fsloutputtype.desc: Output type used by FSL (GZs are not supported by SPM)
